dynamic_line.yes: Ah, I see another fine woman has come to visit our community. Please, do make yourself comfortable. We're very welcoming around here.
dynamic_line.no: Hello, fine gentleman, to our humble town. This is a quite a nice town, is it not? Perhaps a fine place to settle down in during these troubled times..

responses.text: So you're a woman in this town? What do you do around here?
Goodbye, thank you for your time.

dynamic_line.yes: Oh the usual: cooking, cleaning, gardening and so on. It seems tedious at first, but you eventually get used to it. Seeing as how you're a woman, too, I imagine you have the same understanding.
dynamic_line.no: Oh the usual: cooking, cleaning, gardening and so on. It seems tedious at first, but you eventually get used to it. You're a man though, so I imagine you're more suited to the more authoritative parts of life.
